name: Nyora's Garden
description:
My entry for both LOWREZJAM 2021 and A Game By Its Cover 2021. Inspired by Ivan Papiol's fantastic artwork:



Nyora is his entry to Famicase 2021 https://famicase.com/21/
You can check out his Twitter here https://twitter.com/ivanpapiol

Nyora's Garden is a game about the silent and helpful Nyora, who grows a wide range of fruits and vegetables for their local community.
It's also a very short game, able to be completed in less than five minutes, with a single kind of produce to gather for a single NPC, with another NPC afflicted with wishful thinking. :) Have fun!

Controls
WASD for movement
Space to talk
R and T do a thing when prompted

The downloadable archive includes a Windows executable, but if you run Mac or Linux you can download an executable from https://godotengine.org
